alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 12:46PM CST until February 17 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Northeastern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Western Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1246 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Redwood to near Le Tourneau to 7 miles north of Port Gibson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Flowers around 1250 PM CST. Youngton and Newman around 100 PM CST. Edwards and Reganton around 110 PM CST. Bolton around 125 PM CST. Brownsville around 130 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Learned. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for central, southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
